trans-unit.target: TEXT_STMBDZ502_02753_SEQ_00<tab>Khaishan is so worried he is on the verge of saying something.
TEXT_STMBDZ502_02753_SYSTEM_000_000<tab>You can tell from the timidness of Khaishan's nod that he is worried by something.
TEXT_STMBDZ502_02753_SYSTEM_000_003<tab>Khaishan points to the north. The haste with which he extended his arm suggests there is something in that direction which requires your attention.
TEXT_STMBDZ502_02753_MERCHANT02753_000_010<tab>Oh, thank you so much. That was nearly the end of me. I must thank Khaishan as well for sending help.
TEXT_STMBDZ502_02753_MERCHANT02753_000_011<tab>I am quite impressed you understood that you were needed here. Working out exactly what the Qestir are trying to communicate is never easy.

TEXT_STMBDZ502_02753_MERCHANT02753_000_012<tab>They believe all words to be lies and as such never open their mouths. However, they are both loyal and honest─that is why so many are more than happy to do business with them.
TEXT_STMBDZ502_02753_MERCHANT02753_000_013<tab>Tell Khaishan that I will be along shortly. I will set off as soon as I have reloaded my cart.
TEXT_STMBDZ502_02753_MERCHANT02753_000_014<tab>Tell Khaishan that I will be along shortly. I will set off as soon as I have reloaded my cart.
TEXT_STMBDZ502_02753_SYSTEM_000_021<tab>The tension has finally left Khaishan's oh-so-expressive face. You take note of the message of thanks relayed via his warm gaze.
